code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginForm=_ref=>{let{onLogin}=_ref;const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[channel,setChannel]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(username&&channel){onLogin(username,channel);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"login",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Connexion"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Entrez votre nom",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Nom du channel",value:channel,onChange:e=>setChannel(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Se connecter"})]})]});};export default LoginForm;
